metadata.Title: CVE-2016-10214 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - low
metadata.Description:
Memory leak in the virgl_resource_attach_backing function in virglrendererbefore 0.6.0 allows local guest OS users to cause a denial of service(memory consumption) via a large number ofVIRTIO_GPU_CMD_RESOURCE_ATTACH_BACKING commands.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-10214` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libvirglrenderer0 - 0.6.0-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: virglrenderer package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.6.0-1').
